title: Rune crossbow

properties.name: description
properties.value: The rune crossbow is a crossbow that is stronger than the adamant crossbow but weaker than the dragon crossbow. It requires a Ranged level of 61 to wield, and can fire up to and including runite bolts. It is one handed so it can be equipped alongside a shield, such as an anti-dragon shield or god book. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Item ID9185

The rune crossbow is a crossbow that is stronger than the adamant crossbow but weaker than the dragon crossbow. It requires a Ranged level of 61 to wield, and can fire up to and including runite bolts. It is one handed so it can be equipped alongside a shield, such as an anti-dragon shield or god book. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Rune crossbows can be made through the Fletching skill at level 69; a player must first cut a yew stock for the crossbow from yew logs, granting 50 Fletching experience. Then, a player must add Runite limbs to the stock with a hammer in their inventory, granting 100 experience and making an unstrung rune crossbow. Finally, a player must string the crossbow with a crossbow string, granting 50 experience. Creating a rune crossbow from raw materials grants 200 Fletching experience in total, and doing so within Witchaven and/or Yanille is a task for the Elite Ardougne Diary.

Ironmen may obtain a rune crossbow by defeating the Crazy archaeologist. The rune crossbow is commonly used among Ironmen and low-level players for slayer tasks, and for TzHaar Fight Cave, due to the ease of obtaining Broad bolts and the ability to equip a shield. For slayer tasks, a Magic shortbow with Rune or Amethyst Arrows is often a stronger weapon.

The rune crossbow is commonly used even for high-level content due to its ability to fire Ruby and Diamond bolts. The Dragon, Armadyl, Zaryte and Dragon hunter crossbows are stronger alternatives.

[[File:Rune crossbow detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''rune crossbow''' is a [[crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] that is stronger than the [[adamant crossbow]] but weaker than the [[dragon crossbow]]. It requires a [[Ranged]] level of 61 to wield, and can fire up to and including [[runite bolts]]. It is one handed so it can be equipped alongside a [[shield]], such as an [[anti-dragon shield]] or [[god book]]. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Rune crossbows can be made through the [[Fletching]] skill at level 69; a player must first cut a [[yew stock]] for the crossbow from [[yew logs]], granting 50 Fletching [[experience]]. Then, a player must add [[Runite limbs]] to the stock with a hammer in their inventory, granting 100 experience and making an [[Runite crossbow (u)|unstrung rune crossbow]]. Finally, a player must string the crossbow with a [[crossbow string]], granting 50 experience. Creating a rune crossbow from raw materials grants 200 Fletching experience in total, and doing so within Witchaven and/or Yanille is a task for the [[Elite Ardougne Diary]].

[[Ironmen]] may obtain a rune crossbow by defeating the [[Crazy archaeologist]]. The rune crossbow is commonly used among Ironmen and low-level players for slayer tasks, and for [[TzHaar Fight Cave]], due to the ease of obtaining [[Broad bolts]] and the ability to equip a shield. For slayer tasks, a [[Magic shortbow]] with [[Rune arrows|Rune]] or [[Amethyst arrows|Amethyst]] Arrows is often a stronger weapon.

The rune crossbow is commonly used even for high-level content due to its ability to fire [[Ruby bolts (e)|Ruby]] and [[Diamond bolts (e)|Diamond bolts]]. The [[Dragon crossbow|Dragon]], [[Armadyl crossbow|Armadyl]], [[Zaryte crossbow|Zaryte]] and [[Dragon hunter crossbow|Dragon hunter]] crossbows are stronger alternatives.
